summary: Imbue dragon bones with the power of an amulet of Akatosh to create an axe dedicated to the golden dragon of time.
descriptionHtml:
To get this weapon you must combine dragon bones, gold ingots, leather strips and a single Amulet of Akatosh at the forge.

(You must have Dawnguard and the Dragon Smithing perk)

The mer know the god of time as Auriel, however the human races know him as Akatosh, and to all he is the god of time whose preferred avatar is that of a golden dragon. As such this axe is of an ancient Nord design, with a gleaming gild finish and contrasted with black base.

By sanctifying the flames of the forge with an amulet dedicated to him will transfer his power to the axe created. Similar to Aurel\'s bow in magical power, it possesses sun powers which intensify when used upon the undead.

Let me know if anything needs balancing, or if you have any ideas for weapons to represent the other 8 Divines. The Daedra have been hogging the armoury for quite some time now. ;]

Videos:
